page.title: 08GAMES PLAYED
page.content: Popular games in the school playground include: hopscotch, skipping, bulldog and tag. Bulldog - This is a game for four or more players. One person is "on" and the others are attempting to reach "home". The person "on" can call either an individual across to "home" or call "Bulldog" in which case all the children try to reach home at the same time. The one caught is the next person "on". Tag - One person is "on" and has to chase the other children. As soon as he or she catches a child that child is "on". Popular games played as sports are, netball, rounders, football and cricket.
